Lack enough support: The claim lacks any credible evidence or news reports to support the statement attributed to Malia Obama.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Malia Obama has never made such a statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Malia Obama holds a belief that white people should not exist, without any basis or evidence.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact or significance of the statement by suggesting that white people will be "blended out" by a certain age.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on a fabricated quote and circulating misinformation.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is a result of a recycled lie or false information being spread about Malia Obama.
